Class TomcatConnectivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.user.connectivity.impl.TomcatConnectivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserConnectivity

    public class TomcatConnectivity
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserConnectivity
    This class connect to the Tomcat server and fetching the result from the Tomcat server.

    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
